content: **crocheted hat in drops sky and drops kid-silk the piece is worked with relief-stitches sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no skip-151 yarn group b + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 01 white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 01 off white **crochet gauge** 8 treble crochets in width and 9 5 row in height with 1 strand of each quality = 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
